title: ফ্যাক্ট চেক: পশ্চিমবঙ্গ নয়, তেলেঙ্গানা পুলিশের ছবি এটি

vclaim: Obnoxious & inhumane on part of #Telangana police to hurt agitators with such cruelty. They can be arrested & jailed if proven guilty. But this is British way of policing, not friendly policing.Appeal to @TelanganaDGP for stern action on cop who indulged in such shameful act @IYC pic.twitter.com/7iLMokxx5A
